full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL GYI 'KHRUNGS RABS GSOL 'DEBS BRTAN BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,CES BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL GYI 'KHRUNGS RABS GSOL 'DEBS BRTAN BZHUGS DANG BCAS PA 'DI NI PHYAG MDZOD PA BLO BZANG DBANG RGYAL TSOG THU DA'I CHING NO YON, SBYEN PA AER KHE NANG SO, BSTAN 'DZIN NOM CHE DGE BSGOS, 'JAM DBYANGS THON GA LAG PI LIG THU, BSTAN PA @003B TSE RING HOR TSA PI LIG THU RNAMS KYIS MDZOD BTAGS CHE BA SMAN RNYING YUG MDZOD GOS SER PO, YUG BSOD BTAGS LNGA BCAS BSTABS TE KHAL KHA DO LU'U KHO SHO'U GI SBYIN BDAG GRVA RIGS TSA MANG, NGAG 'DON BGYIS CHOG PA 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL NGOR, SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG SNYOMS LAS PA BLO BZANG BSKAL BZANG RGYA MTSOS PHO BRANG PO TA LA'I GZIMS CHUNG NYI 'OD 'KHYIL BAR SBYAR BA'O,, ,,
author_simple: BLO BZANG BSKAL BZANG RGYA MTSO,
